messageBody:
So said Shellman, Joel on 2003-02-07 --------------------

>> That's probably true if the SQL never has to change. If the
>> schema changes, I find it more convenient to go to one known
>> place instead of having to search my entire app for possible
changes.
>
>I find statements like this rather curious. Any decent (well, IMHO)
>IDE/editor/etc. should support global search and replace
functionality.
>"Search my entire app for possible changes" in eclipse is all of:
"Type
>ctrl-h, type in regex, hit enter", and boom, you have every point in
your
>entire app that requires changing. In many cases, you put in the
>replacement value and your entire change is done in one simple step.
<snip />

Even if the tool makes it easy to hack, it's still a hack.
